plot: The Comix Scrutinizer, an elitist comic book critic, reviews bizarre independent comic books, usually in the horror genre.
plot_en: The Comix Scrutinizer, an elitist comic book critic, reviews bizarre independent comic books, usually in the horror genre.
plot_es: The Comix Scrutinizer, an elitist comic book critic, reviews bizarre independent comic books, usually in the horror genre.
title: Comix from the Underground
